markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Master Skysage Divination](/Feats.aspx?ID=4075) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 83</row>

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199)

**Prerequisites**
[Expert Skysage Divination](/Feats.aspx?ID=4071)

</column>

---

You unlock the most powerful secrets hidden in the stars above. You learn a 7th-level spell from any spell list. At 18th level, you learn an 8th-level spell, and at 20th level, you learn a 9th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from the [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) school. You gain master proficiency with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.
name: Master Skysage Divination
